message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within $80. Would you consider selling the product for $100?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $100 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $130?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within $80. Would you be willing to lower your price to $120?
